{"step_by_step_thinking": "According to the relevant documents, the tensor veli palatini muscle (TVP) originates from the scaphoid fossa at the base of the medial pterygoid plate and the spina angularis of the sphenoid. It also originates from the lateral wall of the cartilage of the auditory tube. The muscle then inserts into the palatine aponeurosis and the surface behind the transverse ridge on the horizontal part of the palatine bone. Therefore, the correct answer is D. Origin Lesser wing of sphenoid and scaphoid fossa; Insertion: as palatine aponeurosis into posterior hard palate.", "answer_choice": "D"}
